subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Twelve of the last 25 P.G.A. Championship titlists, including Shaun Micheel, the winner at Oak Hill in 2003, have not taken a second major.
snippet: Twelve of the last 25 P.G.A. Championship titlists, including Shaun Micheel, the winner at Oak Hill in 2003, have not taken a second major.
